name: UNICONTROL
0:
”“Alexa, turn on light kitchen.””
”"Alexa, turn Master ON"”
”“Alexa, turn on the air conditioning.””
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This Skill is intended for UNICONTROL users.
When connected your account to the UNICONTROL cloud, you can control all your devices that are present in your Home Assistant, being them.

- Alarm Control Panel
- Alert, Automation, Group
- Binary Sensor
- Button, Input Button
- Camera
- Climate
- Cover
- Fan
- Image Processing
- Input Number
- Light
- Lock
- Media Player
- Scene
- Script
- Sensor
- Switch, Input Boolean
- timer
- Vacuum

Turn on the lights, turn off the TV and turn on automations via voice commands.
